descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ead1dc][size=4]Description[/size][/color][/font][/b]
[font=Comic Sans MS]This mod changes the appearance of a vanilla NPC, Sapphire to look more eye candy. I created this mod because someone pm'd me asking if I can revamp her looks. She told me that there has been no mods on the nexus that changes Sapphire's looks, so I gave a shot :)
I made some tweaks as well, she can be a follower, and also marriable.
[/font]

[color=#ead1dc][size=4][b]Requirement[/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]xp32 Skeleton[/url] 


[color=#ead1dc][size=4][b]Mod used/Credit[/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature Skin[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Texture[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]Sevenbase[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]Eyes of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://gamer-mods.ru/load/tes_v_skyrim/kosmeticheskie_mody/ks_hairdos_265_zhenskie_i_muzhskie_pricheski_v1_1/14-1-0-2506]Ks Hairdos[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit 1.2[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Expression[/url]
CME Preset by majinosity (google it)


[b][color=#ead1dc][size=4]Note[/size][/color][/b]
 I aim to tweak more vanilla NPCs! write some candidates on the comment section for me, and I  will pick one at a time.


[b][color=#ead1dc][size=4]Permission[/size][/color][/b]
Most of the assets don't belong to me, so I cannot give permission for any purposes. If I continue to see people uploading my mods on the other websites, I'll just stop sharing my mods and use them for myself. Also do realize that your nexus account might get permanently banned. 


[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ead1dc][size=4]My mods[/size][/color][/font][/b]
Check out my other mods! :)

author: choco2114
